New Records: Ben Stokes scored his first World Cup hundred from 78 balls
Key Match Events: Ben Stokes and Chris Woakes added 129 runs for the seventh wicket
Stokes scored 108 from 84 balls including 6 sixes in the final 26 balls
Netherlands collapsed in the face of an unrealistic 340-run chase
Pre-Game Insights: England won the toss and elected to bat
England's fast start hits the breaks with the wicket of Jonny Bairstow
Jos Buttler's ODI average in India is the lowest for any batter to have batted at least 15 times in the top seven
Post-Match Reflections: England's new-ball(s) pair of Woakes and David Willey made a tight start
Ben Stokes' belligerent first World Cup hundred rescued England from a tricky spot against Netherlands
Miscellaneous Highlights: England posted a challenging total after sliding to 192 for 6
Stokes stood firm through the collapse, although he could have been out on 41 when Aryan Dutt put down a tough, low chance at fine leg
Others: England's total of 70 for 1 from their first ten is also their best effort at this World Cup
Netherlands' two wins have come batting first
